content: After having caught sight of her, he fell into a huge confusion of thoughts, was motionless and, in short, turned to stone.
translations: ita:Dopo che l'aveva visto, Ã¨ caduto in una enorme confusione dei pensieri, era divenuto immobile e, in breve, trasformato i
